Hotel_Name: Mercure Paris Gobelins Place d Italie
Negative_Review: Room compact but this is usual for Paris and toiletries a tad basic no hair conditioner small tablet soap rather than hand wash Mini bar is well stocked but prices not displayed be careful Make sure you re carrying a photo ID at check in
Positive_Review: Extremely conveniently located for access from main train stations and to central sites Good range of restaurants in the Avenue Des Gobelins recommend Dolce Romana Efficient housekeeping services in the hotel which is surprisingly quiet given the bustle of the area if you book a courtyard facing room this is set back some way from the street We d definitely return
